column1: **Important Note:** There are only 10 DS3235 35KG servos left on Temu. I checked other suppliers: AliExpress only has 1 left or limits purchase to 1, Amazon is too expensive, and Alibaba charges a $76 shipping fee. I will start working with the 10 servos I have, and continue the project as more servos become available on Temu.

column2: Pololu Mini Maestro 24-Channel USB Servo Controller

column1: The total cost of my project is 831 CAD. The requested grant of 400 USD will cover approximately 560 CAD, and I will personally cover the remaining 271 CAD.
